section.name: Download
section.p: The links on this page lead to version ${project.version} of the CEC.

The CEC component is supplied as a J2EE web-application in a WAR file (http://www.astrogrid.org/maven2/org.astrogrid/astrogrid-cea-cec/${project.version}/astrogrid-cea-cec-${project.version}.war). Download the WAR file to the computer where you want to run the web-application.
